"About Client Orders": "A new client order is available for Revelle. Revelle can be found in the gate area, near the east quest counter."

"A new client order is available for Marlu.

Marlu can be found in the gate area, Central Hall."

"A new client order is available for Ohza.

Ohza can be found in the gate area, Central Hall."

"A new client order is available for Lisa.

Lisa can be found in the gate area, Central Hall."

"A new client order is available for Azanami.

Azanami can be found in the gate area, Central Hall."

"A new client order is available for Saga.

Saga can be found in the gate area, by the central teleporter."

"A new client order is available for Katori.

Katori can be found in the gate area, by the central teleporter."

"A new client order is available for Jean.

Jean can be found in the shop area, South Passage."

"A new client order is available for Lola.

"A new client order is available for Pietro.

Pietro can be found in the gate area, by the Class Counter."

"In the ARKS lobby, there are ARKS who handle each class.

Ohza: Hunter, Fighter
Marlu: Force, Techer
Lisa: Ranger, Gunner
Azanami: Braver
Saga, Katori: Bouncer
Pietro: Summoner

Find them in the Gate Area and talk to them."

"Besides that, various characters
will ask for client orders.

Lola: Gate area, Medical Center
Revelle: East of the Quest Counters
Jean: Shop area, south outer passage

Talk to them too."
